Areej Tayseer Zarrouq bụ nwanyị Sudanese na-eduzi ihe nkiri,  odee na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụ onye otu Sudan Film Factory na Khartoum, ebe ọdịbendị nwere onwe ya, na-akwalite ọzụzụ, mmepụta na nkwalite nke ihe nkiri na Sudan.

Zarrouq nwetara BA ya na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi na Mahadum City Cairo Ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi Orange Tint (2010), nke e mere site n'enyemaka nke Goethe Institute na Khartoum, nyochara otu ụbọchị na ndụ otu ụmụ agbọghọ Sudanese na Kharthum. Ọ na-ekwu maka echiche ha na-abụghị nke omenala.
